item.title: The Addiction Behind Bloons
item.description: By now, I’ll bet you’ve heard of Bloons TD 6. If you haven’t, here’s a quick rundown. Bloons TD is a popular tower defense game developed by Ninja Kiwi. In the game, players place various types of monkey towers along a path to pop waves of colorful balloons (called bloons) before they reach the end of the path.
